name: Pipeline-Executer
description: Used to trigger Kaholo pipelines from other Kaholo pipelines

params.name: authToken
params.description: Access Token of Kaholo Service Account with permissions to execute pipeline(s)

params.name: pipelineId
params.description: Name of Kaholo pipeline to trigger

params.name: configName
params.description: Name of the configuration the pipeline will run with. Leave this empty if Configuration Object is specified

params.name: configObject
params.description: Configuration object which will be used in the execution. Leave this empty if Configuration Name is specified

params.name: triggerMessage
params.description: Description of reason for triggering the execution

params.name: executionInputs
params.description: Key-value pair(s) sent as Kaholo pipeline execution inputs (one key=value pair per line)

params.name: waitUntilPipelineEnds
params.description: Wait for the triggered pipeline to finish and return results of that execution
